title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Prestige
description: Two stage magicians engage in competitive rivalry with tragic results.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
